question: A warehouse has -100 units of a product. If they receive a shipment of 150 units and then sell 120 units, what is the current inventory level?
A basketball team has a win-loss record of 12-8. If they win 5 more games and then lose 3 games, what is their updated win-loss record?
A hiker starts at an elevation of 500 metres, climbs 300 metres, descends 150 metres, and then climbs another 200 metres. What is the final elevation?
A business has a revenue of -$10,000 in January. In February, they earn $15,000, and in March, they incur a loss of $8,000. What is their net revenue over the three months?
A store has -171 units of an item due to overbooking. They receive 600 units in the next shipment and sell 256 units. What is the final inventory count?
